availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Andrew J. Norton (Mercer County Farmer/2nd KY Cav)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of John T. Norton and Sarah Norton. Married to Lucinda Armstrong Norton in Mercer County on September 19, 1862. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860. Enlisted as a private in the 2nd Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) on September 9, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 94.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191864.
